paper.title: A New Method for Portfolio Construction Using a Deep Predictive Model
paper.abstract: A well-designed portfolio plays a key role in achieving investment goal. In this paper, we use Recurrent Neural Networks with Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) Units, to predict potential returns of a collection of investments. Then, we construct diversified portfolios by giving thresholds for the potential returns and examine the return and risk levels of the portfolios. These results show conclusively that it is possible to build a portfolio given a desired degree of return and risk by adjusting the thresholds, which is promising in asset allocations reflected investors' risk preference.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用LSTM神经网络预测投资回报，并基于这些预测构建多样化的投资组合，同时考虑回报和风险水平，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。
